front.title: DHCP Options for Configuring Tenant Identifier and Multicast Addresses in Overlay Networks

abstract.t: This document defines DHCPv4 and DHCPv6 options for assigning VXLAN Network Identifier and multicast addresses for overlay networks such as the Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network (VXLAN). New DHCP options are defined which allow a Network Virtualization Edge to request any source multicast address and tenant identifier for the newly created virtual machine.
